The present invention relates to an automatic washing machine which
automatically carries out the steps of washing, rinsing and dehydrating ,
and more particularly to an automatic washing machine which can indicate
the occurrence of abnormal operation in the steps of washing, rinsing and
draining.
FIG.4 shows a block diagram of an electric circuit 25 which carries out
the controls 1 to 7 described above. The electrical circuit 25 comprises
an LSI central processing unit 26, a drive circuit 30, , an
indication circuit 38, a buzzer circuit 39,
If T T that is, water level in the tub 5 does not reach the
predetermined full level , the abnormal indication by the indication mode X
is made and the operation is stopped.
